Rêve Collection R70237 Toyota Starlet 1980 Fuji Minor Touring A. Hagiwara

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer page: http://www.kokusaiboeki.co.jp/item_detail.php?id=9771

I can't find any details on the 1980 Fuji Minor Touring event (or series?). The black & red Advan livery on this makes it my favorite Starlet. I also like the staggered rear-view mirror on this one.
